item.title: Vicki add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Religion has convinced people that there's an invisible man ... living in the sky. Who watches everything you do every minute of every day. And the invisible man has a list of ten specific things he doesn't want you to do. And if you do any of these things, he will send you to a special place, of burning and fire and smoke and torture and anguish for you to live forever, and suffer, and suffer, and burn, and scream, until the end of time. But he loves you. He loves you. He loves you and he needs money." -- George Carlin

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Chris Rock
item.description: "You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese, the Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named "Bush", "Dick", and "Colin." Need I say more?" -- Chris Rock

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Why is it," he said, one time, at the subway entrance, "I feel I've known you so many years?" "Because I like you," she said, "and I don't want anything from you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "If you're afraid of butter, use cream." -- Julia Child

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "I think every woman should have a blowtorch." -- Julia Child

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "Just speak very loudly and quickly, and state your position with utter conviction, as the French do, and you'll have a marvelous time!" -- Julia Child

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Robert Browning
item.description: "Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?" -- Robert Browning
